info.author: Simone Manini
info.description:
vmtk - The Vascular Modeling Toolkit
vmtk (http://www.vmtk.org) is a collection of libraries and tools for 3D reconstruction,geometric analysis, mesh generation and surface data analysis for image-based modeling of blood vessels.
        
INSTALLATION REQUIREMENTS:
Python 2.7 (http://www.python.org/download/releases/2.7.6/)

Read the HOWTO to build your own distribution or to install vmtk under linux/OSX.
info.name: vmtk
info.html_description:
vmtk - The Vascular Modeling Toolkit vmtk (http://www.vmtk.org) is a collection of libraries and tools for 3D reconstruction,geometric analysis, mesh generation and surface data analysis for image-based modeling of blood vessels.

INSTALLATION REQUIREMENTS: Python 2.7 (http://www.python.org/download/releases/2.7.6/)

Read the HOWTO to build your own distribution or to install vmtk under linux/OSX.
